content: summer is always around the corner when you re anxious to wear this bright crochet halter top created using caron simply soft the pattern is worked flat in half_double_crochet brightly styled with a repeating striped pattern feel free to change up the shades to suit your tastes flaunt it on its own or layer it under a jacket or light sweater for a sassy summer look materials caron® simply soft™ 6 oz/170 g 315 yds/288 m sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm
